name: Moonlight Mischief
description:
Moonlight Mischief


My entry for GBJAM5!

A little game about a ninja with only a grappling hook as a weapon

Clear the level of all the bad guys to advance! Kill bad guys by squishing them with vases, but be careful! If they spot you they'll shoot! Hit bad guys with your hook to get their attention!

--Controls--

WASD - movement
G - use hook to pull vases
H - use hook to pull yourself
G/H - push vase if close enough

-- About the levels --
The first few levels were really my development playgrounds to test out different scenarios. Use these to learn how to use each action.
Towards the end the levels are much more puzzle-y, enjoy!

Special thanks to Baby v Cobra for the music!
